name: Hypersonic Speed Girl / 超速少女
description: I want to run the world faster than anyone else! Exhilaration is outstanding, super fast scroll shooting game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Core2 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
